text:
Entre Computer Services | Full Stack Developer | Rochester, NY | Full-time | Onsite | www.entrecs.com

Entre provides a fast-paced team-oriented environment. We take on a large variety of work including web applications, web sites and mobile/desktop applications. Work on the latest tech with excellent opportunities for career growth.

Required Experience: 2+ years of experience in the following areas: - ASP .NET - .NET MVC / WebAPI - HTML5/CSS3 - JavaScript - SQL Server - IoC / DI frameworks 2+ years experience in at least one of the following JavaScript frameworks: - Angular - Backbone - Ember - Knockout - React

Send resume to: hrdept@entrecs.com * mention HACKERNEWS in the subject to ensure your resume is reviewed by the appropriate team.
